sections.title: Sentinel (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Sentinel class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Sentinel)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, all armor types, and shields except tower shields.

sections.title: Obedience (Ex) (Sentinel)
sections.description: Requires daily obedience to chosen deity to maintain prestige class abilities.

sections.title: Symbolic Weapon (Su) (Sentinel)
sections.description: Grants scaling sacred or profane bonuses to attack and damage rolls when wielding deity's favored weapon, which also functions as a holy symbol.

sections.title: Bonus Feat (Sentinel)
sections.description: Grants bonus combat feats at 2nd and 7th level, with sentinel levels stacking with fighter levels for prerequisites.

sections.title: Divine Boon (Sentinel)
sections.description: Grants three progressive divine boons from chosen deity at 3rd, 6th, and 9th levels, allowing earlier access than Deific Obedience feat alone.

sections.title: Divine Quickness (Ex) (Sentinel)
sections.description: Provides scaling sacred or profane bonus to initiative checks while carrying deity's favored weapon.

sections.title: Aligned Strike (Su) (Sentinel)
sections.description: Allows weapon to bypass specific damage reduction types based on deity's alignment when wielding favored weapon.

sections.title: Stalwart (Su) (Sentinel)
sections.description: Grants sacred or profane bonus on saving throws against divine spells through mental fortitude.

sections.title: Practiced Combatant (Ex) (Sentinel)
sections.description: Provides sacred or profane bonus on combat maneuvers performed with deity's favored weapon.

sections.title: Righteous Leader (Ex) (Sentinel)
sections.description: Grants Leadership feat with special modifiers, including no penalty for moving but double penalty for different alignment cohorts.

sections.title: Unstoppable Warrior (Su) (Sentinel)
sections.description: Grants alignment-based damage reduction, ability to act while at negative hit points, and daily self-targeted cure critical wounds.
